info.title: Verana Indexer API
info.description: Comprehensive API for managing decentralized identifiers, trust registries, credential schemas, and permissions in the Verana ecosystem

get.description: Retrieve a specific Decentralized Identifier document by its DID

parameters.name: response_max_size
parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return
